title: Add YouTube channel button on File 5

requirements.summary: Add a prominently styled button to the fifth story page (File 5) that opens the YouTube channel https://www.youtube.com/@E.J-Money in a new browser tab
acceptanceCriteria: A button is visible only on the fifth story page (File 5).
Clicking the button navigates the user to https://www.youtube.com/@E.J-Money.
The link opens in a new browser tab (target='_blank' with appropriate rel attributes).
The button is visually distinct from the previous/next navigation buttons.
The button is not shown on any other story page (Files 1â€“4).

file_operations.description: Add a YouTube channel button that appears only when storyNumber equals 5. Place the button near the bottom of the page content, above the navigation buttons. Style it distinctly from the existing previous/next buttons using Tailwind classes and the app's OKLCH color tokens. The button should open https://www.youtube.com/@E.J-Money in a new tab with target='_blank' and rel='noopener noreferrer' for security. Conditionally render this button based on storyNumber prop.
